languages.text: "Друкари в первую очередь нужна живая сила — зачем они тратят силы на атаку дворца, когда могли штурмовать еще один город?"

traits.locale_text: "Друкари в первую очередь нужна живая сила — зачем они тратят силы на атаку дворца, когда могли штурмовать еще один город?"

languages.text: "The Drukhari are after living victims above all else — why would they waste their forces assaulting the palace when they could be storming another city?"
languages.original_text: "Друкари в первую очередь нужна живая сила — зачем они тратят силы на атаку дворца, когда могли штурмовать еще один город?"

traits.locale_text: "The Drukhari are after living victims above all else — why would they waste their forces to assault the palace when they could be storming another city?"
"The Drukhari are after living victims above all else — why would they waste their forces to assault the palace when they could be storming another city?"
"The Drukhari are after living victims above all else — why would they waste their forces assaulting the palace when they could be storming another city?"
"The Drukhari are after living victims above all else — why would they waste their forces assaulting the palace when they could be storming another city?"
"The Drukhari are after living victims above all else — why would they waste their forces assaulting the palace when they could be storming another city?"

languages.text: 「デュカーリは生きた獲物を何よりも狙うはず――他の都市を攻撃することもできるだろうに、なぜ宮廷の襲撃に軍隊を割く必要が？」
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari are after living victims above all else — why would they waste their forces assaulting the palace when they could be storming another city?"

traits.locale_text: 「デュカーリは生きた獲物を何よりも狙うはず――他の都市を攻撃することもできるだろうに、なぜ宮廷の襲撃に軍隊を割く必要が？」

languages.text: “黑暗灵族最喜欢活捉俘虏，但他们宁愿浪费时间攻打我的宫殿，也不愿意抓住这个机会再拿下一座城市，这是怎么回事？”
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari are after living victims above all else — why would they waste their forces assaulting the palace when they could be storming another city?"

traits.locale_text: “黑暗灵族最喜欢活捉俘虏，但他们宁愿浪费时间攻打我的宫殿，也不愿意抓住这个机会再拿下一座城市，这是怎么回事？”

languages.text: «Los Drukhari buscan víctimas vivas ante todo... ¿por qué malgastarían sus fuerzas en un ataque al palacio cuando podrían asaltar otra ciudad?».
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari are after living victims above all else — why would they waste their forces assaulting the palace when they could be storming another city?"

traits.locale_text: «Los Drukhari buscan víctimas vivas ante todo... ¿por qué malgastarían sus fuerzas en un ataque al palacio cuando podrían asaltar otra ciudad?».

languages.text: « Les Drukharis sont à la recherche de victimes vivantes avant tout. Pourquoi se donneraient-ils la peine de prendre le palais alors qu'ils pourraient attaquer une autre ville ? »
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari are after living victims above all else — why would they waste their forces assaulting the palace when they could be storming another city?"

traits.locale_text: « Les Drukharis sont à la recherche de victimes vivantes avant tout. Pourquoi se donneraient-ils la peine de prendre le palais alors qu'ils pourraient attaquer une autre ville ? »

languages.text: "Die Drukhari wollen vor allem lebende Opfer – warum sollten sie Truppen opfern, um den Palast anzugreifen, wenn sie eine andere Stadt erstürmen könnten?"
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari are after living victims above all else — why would they waste their forces assaulting the palace when they could be storming another city?"

traits.locale_text: "Die Drukhari wollen vor allem lebende Opfer – warum sollten sie Truppen opfern, um den Palast anzugreifen, wenn sie eine andere Stadt erstürmen könnten?"

languages.text: "Drukhariler için en değerli şey, yaşayan kurbandır. Başka bir şehre saldırmak varken neden kuvvetlerini sarayda harcıyorlar ki?"
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari are after living victims above all else — why would they waste their forces assaulting the palace when they could be storming another city?"

traits.locale_text: "Drukhariler için en değerli şey, yaşayan kurbanlardır. Başka bir şehre saldırmak varken neden kuvvetlerini saraya harcıyorlar ki?"
